name: Bionic Fighters- Super Smash Bros Style Combat
blurb: Super Smash Bros style combat for the PC, Ouya, and MOJO android console with 4 player online and local multiplayer support!

rewards.reward:
Our studio will tell you that you are AWESOME! Plus, get an exclusive Bionic Fighters Desktop background for all reward tiers!
==============================
